RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 1 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 39. Maiden Special Weight Purse 16500. FOR ACCREDITED WEST VIRGINIA-BRED MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. (Preference To Horses That Have Not Started For Less Than $15,000).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: FRIENDLY LUCY broke slowly moving up into the turn coming four wide in upper stretch angling six wide while surging clear late. S S COSMOPOLITAN stalked the pace drawing even in upper stretch wresting a late lead only to be overpowered from the outside in the final yards. LADY GANGSTER sent clear set the pace through the turn being hooked from the outside in upper stretch weakening late. SUNSET QUEEN slow early played no factor. S S FLAMINGO was never involved. MACHEN MARGARITAS was a step slow throughout. BIT OF BLESSINGS was fractious in the gate pre start.

ENTRY.NAME: Friendly Lucy
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke slowly, gained through the turn, 4-6 wide lane surged clear

ENTRY.NAME: Lady Gangster
ENTRY.COMMENT: sent clear, set pace, hooked top lane, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: S S Cosmopolitan
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, drew even abreast lane, led late, overpowered

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 2 6F Dirt CR: 77. Claiming Purse 7900. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE SINCE OCTOBER 3, 2022. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000 (W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SUDDENLY SEDUCTIVE gained on the turn angling four wide for the stretch run surging late getting up abreast rival. PROFESSIONAL set the pace digging in down the stretch being hooked late from the outside ceding grudgingly at the wire. AREYOUTALKINGTOME hustled up on the inside chased through the turn then down the lane proving no match at the rail in a solid effort. BRIAR JUMPER pressed through the turn weakening in upper stretch. SOURNOIS raced evenly playing no factor. WHISKEY MOMENT was never involved. DREAM SATURDAY raced a step slow throughout. CAVALLOTTO was always outrun.

ENTRY.NAME: Areyoutalkingtome
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled up inside, chased to lane, no match, held well

ENTRY.NAME: Suddenly Seductive
ENTRY.COMMENT: gained turn, angled out lane, hooked foe late, up abreast

ENTRY.NAME: Professional
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pace, dug in lane, hooked late, ceded grudgingly

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 3 1M Dirt CR: 77. Claiming Purse 7900. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since September 3 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000 (W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: COASTAL CHAOS set a pressured pace shaking clear on the far turn holding sway through the lane in the three path. STRAUS'S PLACE tracked evenly emerging on the far turn chasing willingly down the stretch. PAPA CHARLES saved ground vying on the far turn weakening along the rail down the lane. BON DEUX pressured the pace through the backside then wilted on the far turn. SMALL BUT FEISTY folded up early.

ENTRY.NAME: Coastal Chaos
ENTRY.COMMENT: set a pressured pace, clear far turn, held sway

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Mike Buckley, Meg Buckley & Tim Thornton

ENTRY.NAME: Papa Charles
ENTRY.COMMENT: saved ground, vied far turn, weakened on rail lane

ENTRY.NAME: Straus's Place
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked evenly, emerged far turn, chased willingly lane

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 4 1M Dirt CR: 69. Maiden Special Weight Purse 16500. FOR MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: STEEL HAWK stalked the pace pressing for the lead on the far turn shaking clear in upper stretch holding firm to wire. THE MONSTER IRUS slow early moved up on the far turn vying from mid track down the lane rallying as a clear second best. MOON OVER DUBAI set the pace being hooked on the far turn weakening in upper stretch. ZINFATUATION tracked evenly racing six wide down the lane holding spot there. MO TOWN BLUES raced second flight posing no menace. TRUST FUND ROBBER played no factor. SENSE OF GOLDEN was never involved. DOUBLE OVERTIME faded on the far turn. FAR FROM HOME stumbled leaving the gate, rushed with early speed had nothing left on the far turn.

ENTRY.NAME: Steel Hawk
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, pressed far turn, shook clear lane, driving,

ENTRY.NAME: Zinfatuation
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked evenly, 6 wide lane, held spot

ENTRY.NAME: Moon Over Dubai
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pace, hooked far turn, weakened lane

ENTRY.NAME: The Monster Irus
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, mild move far turn, mid track lane, rallied place

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 5 5F Dirt CR: 58. Maiden Claiming Purse 7700. FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: RED DELICIOUS rallied to bid three deep on the turn extending from mid track down the lane getting up with a final surge abreast rival. JANTIVA sent clear set the pace being hooked inside on the turn clearing again in upper stretch digging in late being grabbed in the final yards. KETO FRIENDLY pressed between horses on the turn then weakened in upper stretch. IT'S A BIG SONG played no factor. MORE TO FOLLOW was always outrun. SONG OF THE HEART faded along the inside on the turn. PER RULING FROM WEST VIRGINIA RACING COMMISSION, RED DELICIOUS WAS DISQUALIFIED FOR POSITIVE TEST.

ENTRY.NAME: Jantiva
ENTRY.COMMENT: sent clear, set pace, hooked inside turn, dug in, grabbed late

ENTRY.NAME: dq-Red Delicious
ENTRY.COMMENT: rallied three deep turn, extended mid track lane, rallied up

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 6 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 80. Claiming Purse 8100. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since September 3 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000 (W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: EL CARDINAL in tight at the break made the early lead edging clear on the turn widening in upper stretch holding safe to wire. BEST CHOICE BABY in tight at the break chased the pace to upper stretch being held at bay late. TALK TO TOKEY in tight at the break lagged to upper stretch moving up some late six wide. HROTHGAR slow early lagged to upper stretch failing to menace. KAPHAVATA was pinched back at the break. WISE KHOZAN pressed early then weakened on the turn.

ENTRY.NAME: Hrothgar
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, lagged to lane, no menace

ENTRY.NAME: Best Choice Baby
ENTRY.COMMENT: in tight break, chased pace, extended lane, held at bay

ENTRY.NAME: Talk to Tokey
ENTRY.COMMENT: in tight at the break, lagged to lane, mild rally late 6 wide,

ENTRY.NAME: El Cardinal
ENTRY.COMMENT: in tight, made lead, clear to lane, held safe

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Cherie M. Abner & Michael A. Bossio

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 7 1M Dirt CR: 85. Allowance Optional Claiming Purse 21200. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, OR STARTER OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES OR CLAIMING PRICE $15,000. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A M ile Or Over Since September 3 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $15,000 (Claiming Races For $12,500 Or Less Not Considered In Estimating Allowances)(W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: RIGHT TRAPPE stalked the pace bidding clear on the far turn holding sway through the lane. MAUREENLOVESFRANK tracked the pace vying on the far turn bidding along the inside down the lane proving second best. SASSY JUSTICE tracked the pace weakening on the far turn racing evenly down the lane to best the others. JAMESTOWN ROAD slow early lagged to upper stretch passing a few there. PASSO A FRENTE slow early played no factor. LA BRODY was never involved. POLYESTER BRIDE broke through the gate declared non starter. CRICKET WEST was always outrun. AFTER REVIEW POLYESTER BRIDE BROKE THROUGH THE GATE EARLY AND WAS DECLARED A NON STARTER.

ENTRY.NAME: Right Trappe
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, bid clear far turn, held sway to wire

ENTRY.NAME: Sassy Justice
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked pace, weakened far turn, evenly to best others

ENTRY.NAME: Maureenlovesfrank
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked pace, vied far turn, bid inside lane, held at bay

ENTRY.NAME: Jamestown Road
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, lagged to lane, passed a few there

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 8 6F Dirt CR: 74. Claiming Purse 9000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since September 3 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $6,500 (W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: QUANTUM THEORY broke sharply setting the pace through the turn angling out in upper stretch holding under a drive. BOURBON TALKING stalked the pace chasing on the turn being carried out in upper stretch hanging late. OMEGA GOLD tracked the pace through the turn extending into upper stretch lacking surge there hanging on to posiiton. CHASING A PAYDAY slow early gave a mild rally to upper stretch finishing evenly. JOYRIDE slow early lagged to lane passing tired ones there. KALINBA played no factor. CAPONE'S LOFT was never involved. OCEAN KISS raced evenly tiring in upper stretch. YDOUHAVETOBESOMEAN was always outrun. AN OBJECTION FROM THE RIDER OF BOURBON TALKING AGAINST THE RIDER OF QUANTUM THEORY FOR INTERFERENCE IN UPPER STRETCH WAS DISMISSED BY THE STEWARDS.

ENTRY.NAME: Chasing a Payday
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, mild rally to lane, finished evenly,

ENTRY.NAME: Bourbon Talking
ENTRY.OWNER: Quarter Pole Investments LLC and Fletcher Kevin
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, chased turn, carried out top lane, hung

ENTRY.NAME: Quantum Theory
ENTRY.OWNER: Bernardini Jay P Burnsworth Richard and Buyea Kristina
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke sharply, set pace, angled out lane, driving,

ENTRY.NAME: Omega Gold
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked evenly, extended to lane, lacked surge
